summary: Anger card damage buffed by 1.
Anger damage increased from 5 to 6
Backstab cost lowered to 0, damage decreased to 11.

patch: Weekly Patch 1: The First of Many!
summary: Berserk card received a buff.
Berserk trigger condition adjusted to activate at ≤50% health.
Berserk reworked: now grants Vulnerable for multiple turns in exchange for +1 Energy per turn.

diffs.before: Conditional energy gain at low HP
diffs.after: Gain Vulnerable. At the start of your turn, gain 1 Energy.

summary: Berserk self-inflicted Vulnerable decreased from 5 to 3.
Berserk cost reduced from 1 to 0. Upgrade effect changed: Vulnerable penalty reduced from 3 to 2.
Berserk card buffed. Self Vulnerable 3 -> 2.
Blade Dance rarity lowered from Uncommon to Common.
Blade Dance buffed: 2→3 Shivs. Blade Dance+ 3→4 Shivs.
Blood for Blood damage increased from 16 to 18
Bloodletting HP loss reduced from 4 to 3.
Bloodletting energy gain increased from 1 to 2. Bloodletting+ from 2 to 3.
Carnage damage increased from 18 to 20
Combust card damage buffed from 4 to 5.
Combust+ damage increased from 6 to 7.
Corruption rarity changed from Uncommon to Rare (undocumented change).
Dark Embrace rarity changed from Rare to Uncommon (undocumented change).

patch: Weekly Patch 1: The First of Many!
summary: Dual Wield card reworked and buffed.
Dual Wield can no longer duplicate skills, stopping the easy infinites.
Dual Wield rarity changed from Common to Uncommon.
Evolve reworked: no longer gives Wounds, now triggers on any Status card (not just Wounds).

diffs.before: Triggers on Wounds only, gives Wounds
diffs.after: Triggers on any Status card, no longer gives Wounds

summary: Feel No Pain block reduced from 4 to 3
Feel No Pain+ upgrade is now +1 rather than +2.
Fire Breathing reworked. Previously dealt 1 damage per attack played at end of turn. Now deals 6 (10) damage to all enemies whenever a Status or Curse card is drawn.

diffs.before: At end of turn, deal 1 damage to all enemies for each Attack played this turn
diffs.after: Whenever you draw a Status or Curse card, deal 6 (10) damage to all enemies

summary: Hemokinesis damage increased from 14 to 15, HP loss decreased from 3 to 2. Hemokinesis+ damage increased from 18 to 20.
Immolate completely redesigned: changed from conditional exhaust to dealing 18 (24) damage to all enemies, adding a Burn to draw pile.

diffs.before: Exhaust 1 Card. If Status/Curse, deal 10 (15) damage to all enemies
diffs.after: Deal 18 (24) damage to ALL enemies. Add a Burn to draw pile.

summary: Immolate Burn now goes to discard pile instead of draw pile. Damage buffed from 18 to 21
Offering HP loss reduced from 6 to 4, card draw increased from 3 to 5.
Offering self damage increased from 4 to 5.
Offering HP loss increased from 5 to 6.
Rage cost changed from 1 to 0, block per Attack changed from 4 to 3.
Rampage damage scaling per play increased from 4 to 5.
Reckless Charge reworked: now shuffles a Dazed into draw pile rather than making you Vulnerable.

diffs.after: Shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile

summary: Reckless Charge is now Uncommon. Reckless Charge+ damage nerfed by 1.
Rupture+ Strength gain increased from 1 to 2, cost increased from 0 to 1.
Sever Soul+ damage increased from 20 to 22.
Wild Strike changed to Uncommon rarity.
Wild Strike changed to Common rarity.
Wraith Form completely reworked: changed from dealing 3 (5) damage to random enemies when playing skills, to granting Intangible while reducing Dexterity each turn.

diffs.before: Deal 3 (5) damage to random enemies when playing skills
diffs.after: Gain 3 (4) Intangible. At the end of your turn, lose 1 Dexterity.

summary: Wraith Form nerf: 3→2 Intangible. Wraith Form+: 4→3 Intangible.
Corpse Explosion reworked: changed to 'Apply 6 Poison. When this enemy dies, deal damage to ALL enemies equal to its max HP.'

diffs.after: Apply 6 Poison. When this enemy dies, deal damage equal to its max HP to ALL enemies.

summary: Crippling Poison reworked and renamed to Crippling Cloud. Apply 4 (7) Poison and 2 Weak to ALL enemies. Exhaust.

diffs.after: Apply 4 (7) Poison and 2 Weak to ALL enemies. Exhaust.

summary: Crippling Poison+ poison and weak values increased from 4 to 5.
Deadly Poison buffed from 4 to 5
Malaise rarity increased from Uncommon to Rare.
Nightmare+ nerfed: previously added 4 copies of cards, now reduces energy cost to 2 instead.
Card reworked with new cost and effect structure. Cost set to 2, dealing 8 damage with conditional energy gain upon discard.

diffs.after: Cost 2, deal 8 damage. If discarded, gain 2 Energy.

patch: Weekly Patch 17: Patched in the Face
summary: Card renamed from Underhand Strike to Sneaky Strike.
Sneaky Strike damage increased from 8 to 10
Sneaky Strike damage increased from 10 to 12
Storm of Steel+ reworked to provide upgraded Shivs instead of lowering cost.
Storm of Steel cost reduced from 2 to 1. Storm of Steel+ cost reduced from 2 to 1.
Tactician rarity changed to Uncommon.

patch: Weekly Patch 1: The First of Many!
summary: Well-Laid Plans completely reworked.
Well-Laid Plans cost increased from 0 to 1.
Accuracy card buffed. Damage increased from 3 to 4. Accuracy+ from 5 to 6.

patch: Weekly Patch 17: Patched in the Face
summary: All-Out Attack reworked and buffed. Discard effect changed to 'discard 1 card at random'.
Bullet Time now affects all cards in hand, works with Madness, and no longer applies a Power to you.

diffs.before: Applies a Power that reduces costs
diffs.after: All cards in hand cost 0 this turn. You can no longer draw cards this turn.

summary: Eviscerate damage increased from 6 to 7. Eviscerate+ from 8 to 9.
Good Instincts+ block increased from 4 to 7.
Good Instincts block increased from 4 to 5. Good Instincts+ from 7 to 8.
Good Instincts block increased from 5 to 6. Good Instincts+ from 8 to 9.
Heel Hook+ damage increased from 7 to 8.
Phantasmal Killer cost reduced from 2 to 1. Phantasmal Killer+ cost from 1 to 0.
Reflex card draw increased from 1 to 2. Reflex+ from 2 to 3.
Sadistic Nature+ damage increased from 3 to 4.
Sadistic Nature damage increased from 3 to 5. Sadistic Nature+ from 4 to 7.
Slice damage increased from 5 to 6. Slice+ from 8 to 9.
Swift Strike+ damage increased from 5 to 8.
Swift Strike damage increased from 5 to 6. Swift Strike+ from 8 to 9.
Swift Strike damage increased from 6 to 7. Swift Strike+ from 9 to 10.
Dramatic Entrance+ damage increased from 6 to 8.
Dramatic Entrance damage increased from 6 to 8. Dramatic Entrance+ from 8 to 12.
Mind Blast+ now grants Innate status.
Mind Blast is now always Innate, costs 2, upgrade reduces cost to 1.
Trip+ now applies 2 Vulnerable to ALL enemies instead of single target.
Transmutation reworked from 'Transform your Hand' to 'Gain X random colorless cards'.

diffs.before: Cost X → Transform your Hand. Exhaust.
diffs.after: Cost X → Gain X random colorless cards. Exhaust.

summary: Cards acquired by Transmutation now cost 0 for the turn.

diffs.after: Gain X random colorless cards that cost 0 this turn

summary: Deflect+ block increased from 6 to 7.
Glacier block nerfed from 9 to 8.
Glacier block nerfed from 8 to 7.
Hyperbeam damage buffed from 25 to 26.
Ball Lightning+ damage nerfed from 4 to 3 additional damage on upgrade.
Reprogram card reworked.

diffs.after: Lose 1 Focus. Gain 1 Strength. Gain 1 Dexterity.

summary: Reprogram Focus loss decreased from 2 to 1. Reprogram+ Focus loss, Strength, and Dexterity changed from 1 to 2.
Aggregate energy gained every 6 cards changed to every 4 cards. Aggregate+ from every 5 to every 3.
Scrape draw increased from 3 to 4. Scrape+ damage 9→10, draw 4→5.
Lock-On card reworked and renamed to Bullseye.

diffs.before: Deal 9 (12) damage. Target receives 50% more damage from Orbs.

summary: Bullseye buffed. Lock-On 1→2. Bullseye+ damage 10→11.
Ritual Dagger base damage increased from 9 to 12.
Ritual Dagger base damage increased from 12 to 15. Upgrade bonus amount from 1 to 2.
Black Blood relic buffed. Heal increased from 10 to 12.
Calling Bell reworked. Previously gave 3 curses and 3 relics. Now gives a unique 'Curse of the Bell' and 3 relics.

diffs.before: Obtain 3 random relics. Obtain 3 random Curses.
diffs.after: Obtain 3 random relics. Obtain Curse of the Bell.

summary: Centennial Puzzle relic rarity changed from Uncommon to Common.
Eternal Feather healing buffed from 2 to 3 HP per 5 cards.
Eternal Feather rarity changed from Boss to Uncommon.
Hovering Kite nerfed: discard requirement increased from 1 to 2.
Hovering Kite reworked. Old: 'Gain 1 Energy and discard 2 cards at the start of your turn'. New: 'The first time you discard a card each turn, gain 1 Energy'.

diffs.before: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Energy and discard 2 cards.
diffs.after: The first time you discard a card each turn, gain 1 Energy.

summary: Lizard Tail rarity changed from Boss to Rare.
Meal Ticket relic added as a shop relic.

diffs.after: Added to game as Shop rarity

summary: Meal Ticket healing increased from 7 to 10 HP.
Meal Ticket healing increased from 10 to 15 HP.
Meal Ticket rarity changed from Shop to Common.
Orrery rarity changed to Uncommon (temporarily removed due to crashes).
Orrery reverted back to Boss relic status.
Orrery rarity changed from Boss to Shop.
Prayer Wheel reworked and changed from Common to Rare. Now doubles normal combat card drops instead of adding cards to chests.

diffs.after: Normal combat card rewards are doubled

summary: Question Card rarity changed from Boss to Uncommon.
Runic Pyramid no longer has a downside. Previously -1 card draw per turn.
Snecko Eye added as a new Boss relic.

diffs.after: Added to game as Boss relic

summary: Sozu now prevents acquiring new potions rather than preventing usage (similar to Ectoplasm).

diffs.before: You can no longer use potions
diffs.after: You can no longer obtain potions

summary: Tiny Chest relic reworked.

diffs.after: Every 4th ? room is a Treasure room

summary: Toolbox relic rarity changed from Uncommon to Shop.
Toolbox buffed: choose 1 of 3 Colorless cards instead of obtaining a random one.
Toy Ornithopter healing increased from 3 to 5.
Toy Ornithopter rarity changed from Shop to Common.
White Beast Statue rarity changed from Boss to Uncommon.
Wrist Blade added as Silent Boss relic.

diffs.after: Added as Silent Boss relic. +3 damage on 0-cost attacks.

summary: Wrist Blade additional damage increased from 3 to 4.
Shop rarity relics base price reduced from 200 to 150.
Blood Potion healing increased from 10% to 25%.
Blood Potion healing changed from 25% to 20%. Rarity changed from Uncommon to Common.
Fairy in the Bottle healing buffed from 10% to 30% HP.
Focus Potion rarity changed from Uncommon to Common.
Ghost in a Jar rarity changed from Uncommon to Rare.
The Specimen rarity changed from Boss to Rare.
Fire Potion nerf: Damage 25 → 20
Explosive Potion nerf: Damage 15 → 10
Poison Potion nerf: Poison 7 → 6
Block Potion buff: Block 10 → 12
Dexterity Potion buff: Dexterity 1 → 2
Strength Potion buff: Strength 1 → 2
Fairy in a Bottle nerf: Heal 40% → 30% Max HP
Cleave damage buffed from 7 to 8 (upgraded: 10 to 11).
Flame Barrier+ buffed to deal 2 more damage back per attack.
Die Die Die reworked: now Exhausts instead of subtracting 2 Dexterity.

diffs.before: Deal 13 damage to ALL enemies. Lose 2 Dexterity.
diffs.after: Deal 13 damage to ALL enemies. Exhaust.

summary: Grand Finale cost reduced from 2 to 1.
Grand Finale cost reduced from 1 to 0.
Grand Finale damage increased from 40 to 50 (upgraded: 50 to 60).
Leg Sweep block nerfed from 12 to 11 (upgraded: 15 to 14).

patch: Weekly Patch 1: The First of Many!
summary: Tools of the Trade nerfed: no longer Innate.
Hand of Greed added as a new colorless card.
Hand of Greed damage increased from 15 to 20 (upgraded: 20 to 25).
The Bomb added as a new colorless card.
The Bomb+ damage increased from 36 to 40.
The Bomb base damage increased from 30 to 40 (upgraded: 40 to 50).
Unload damage increased from 12 to 14 (upgraded: 16 to 18).
Juggernaut damage increased from 3 to 5 (upgraded: 5 to 6).
Juggernaut+ upgrade amount increased from 1 to 2 (damage 6 to 7).
Fission now costs 0. Fission+ now Evokes all orbs rather than removing them.
Apotheosis cost changed from 0 to 2. Upgraded cost changed from 0 to 1. Colorless cards gained upgrades.
Enlightenment rarity changed from Rare to Uncommon.
Panacea reworked to: Gain 1 Artifact. Exhaust. Upgrades to gain 2 Artifact.

diffs.before: Remove all Weak and Vulnerable from yourself

summary: Madness nerfed from cost 2 to cost 1; upgrade now reduces cost to 0.
Masterful Stab reworked: previously could only be played with empty hand for 16(21) damage. Now costs 0 but gains 1 energy cost each time you lose HP.

diffs.before: Can only be played if hand is empty. Deal 16 damage. (Upgraded: 21 damage.)
diffs.after: Deal 12 damage. Costs 1 more energy for each time you lose HP this combat. (Upgraded: 16 damage.)

summary: Stone Calendar damage increased from 40 to 50.
Stone Calendar damage increased from 50 to 52 for flavor.
Brimstone added as a new shop relic.
Brimstone buffed: now gives player 2 Strength and enemies 1 Strength (was 1 and 1).
Philosopher's Stone enemy Strength gain reduced from 2 to 1.
Incense Burner nerfed: cooldown increased from 5 to 6 turns.
Thread and Needle nerfed: Plated Armor reduced from 5 to 4.
Singing Bowl rarity changed from Common to Uncommon.
Tough Bandages rarity changed from Uncommon to Rare.
Red Skull is now Common rarity.
Bronze Scales Thorns increased from 2 to 3.

summary: Unceasing Top rarity changed from Uncommon to Rare.
Membership Card changed to only apply a discount (no longer increases shop appearance).

diffs.before: Shop prices reduced by 50%. Shop appears more often.

summary: Warcry unupgraded form buffed: cost reduced to 0, draws 1 card, places 1 card on draw pile.

summary: Concentrate card reworked.

diffs.after: Discard 3 cards. Gain 2 Energy. Upgraded: Discard 2 cards.

summary: Calculated Gamble card nerfed.
